00562 // =======================================================================
00563 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =
00564 inline void
00565 MapSettings::setShowType( ShowType type, bool use ) {
00566    if ( use ) {
00567       m_showTypeMask |= type;
00568    } else if ( shouldShow( type ) ) {
00569       m_showTypeMask ^= type;
00570    }
00571 }
00572 
00573 inline bool
00574 MapSettings::shouldShow( ShowType type ) const {
00575    return m_showTypeMask & type;
00576 }
00577 
00578 uint32 
00579 MapSettings::getSize() const {
00580    return m_size;
00581 }
00582 
00583 
00584 inline void 
00585 MapSettings::setMapContent( bool showMap, bool showTopographMap,
00586                             bool showPOI, bool showRoute )
00587 {
00588    setShowType( MapSettings::MAP, showMap );
00589    setShowType( MapSettings::TOPOGRAPH_MAP, showTopographMap );
00590    setShowType( MapSettings::POI, showPOI );
00591    setShowType( MapSettings::ROUTE, showRoute );
00592 }
00593
